mapper.select: select count(TempApplyId) from p_myproducttempapply where TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select from p_myproducttempapply where TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and Status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select from p_myproducttempapply where TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and UserId=#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 1
select from p_myproducttempapply where CartId=#{cartId,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 1
select from p_myproducttempapply where UserId=#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by CreateTime desc
select count(*) from p_myproducttempapply where UserId=#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (IsRead is null or IsRead=0)
select max(Sort) from p_myproducttempapply where TempId = #{tempid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and STATUS!=0 and STATUS!=2
